end
    end
  end
end

always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (reset == 1'b1) begin
    pattern_sync <= 1'b0;
    match_counter <= 2'h0;
  end else begin
    if (match_counter == 2'h0) begin
      pattern_sync <= 1'b0;
    end else if (match_counter == 2'h3) begin
      pattern_sync <= 1'b1;
    end

    if (pattern_match == 1'b1) begin
      if (match_counter != 2'h3) begin
        match_counter <= match_counter + 1'b1;
      end
    end else begin
      if (match_counter != 2'h0) begin
        match_counter <= match_counter - 1'b1;
      end
    end
  end
end

endmodule
